pre-tool-use.name: commit-message-lint
pre-tool-use.command: echo 'ðŸ’¡ Commit message tips: Use conventional format (feat:/fix:/docs:/chore:/refactor:)'

pre-tool-use.name: branch-check
pre-tool-use.command: branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null) && if [ "$branch" = "main" ] || [ "$branch" = "master" ]; then echo 'âš ï¸  Working on main branch - consider creating a feature branch'; fi || true

pre-tool-use.name: uncommitted-changes-check
pre-tool-use.command: if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ]; then echo 'ðŸ“ Uncommitted changes detected - consider committing or stashing first'; git status --short | head -5; fi

pre-tool-use.name: pre-push-checks
pre-tool-use.command: echo 'ðŸ” Pre-push checks:' && git log --oneline @{u}.. 2>/dev/null | head -5 && echo 'ðŸ“Š Files changed:' && git diff --stat @{u}.. 2>/dev/null | tail -1 || echo 'Branch not tracking remote yet'

post-tool-use.name: post-commit-summary
post-tool-use.command: if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 'âœ… Commit successful' && git log -1 --oneline; fi

post-tool-use.name: post-merge-reminder
post-tool-use.command: if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 'ðŸ”„ Merge complete - consider running tests and checking for conflicts'; fi

post-tool-use.name: pr-creation-helper
post-tool-use.command: if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 'ðŸŽ¯ PR/Push successful! Next steps:' && echo '  1. Review CI/CD status' && echo '  2. Request code review' && echo '  3. Update documentation if needed'; fi

post-tool-use.name: stash-reminder
post-tool-use.command: if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then stash_count=$(git stash list | wc -l) && echo "ðŸ“¦ Stashed changes (total stashes: $stash_count)" && echo "Use 'git stash pop' to restore"; fi
